choices: Angel, this girl who is obsessed with you
1.content:
As you enter school this day, you can't help but feel strange as if every girl is watching your every move. You become paranoid as if they all know something you don't! Does your hair look funny? Are your clothes ripped? Can they see something you don't? Well the answer to what is strange about today comes as soon as you walk into the halls, you suddenly shrink to about 5 inches tall!

Now you need the help of one of your friends if you want to make it out of these halls, but who finds you first?
1.title: A Strange Day

info.brief_description: His friends choose what happens to him
info.description:
Kyle is not the type of guy to easily make friends with other guys, so he usually hangs out with the girls at his high school. He knows most of them well as he is one of the cuter guys at school.

One day his life is changed when he suddenly shrinks at school and needs the help of his friends, but his life is in their hands now!

Please no male giants and don't kill off the main character too quickly

Any fetish allowed

Feel free to add characters with a brief description
